title: Breaking down the big team fights from the NA LCS Spring Split Playoffs

replies.body:
Final standings will be
1st-TSM
2nd-C9
3rd-TIP
4th-TL

1st-C9
2nd-TSM
3rd-TL
4th-TIP

You messed up I'll fix it: (Bold fixes)

>**1st-TL**
>**2nd-C9**
>**3rd-TSM**
>4th-TIP

wait...if tl is first, then c9 would have lost and they couldn't possibly get 2nd...

downvoted not because of fanboying, but flat out wrong
Good point. I feel ashamed. Punish me!
pls no more fanboyz pls.
this guy knows what hes talking about
No Way. As much as I want to agree, well about somethings. TSM will not win.
We'll see then huh? :)
Oh we'll see alright. And I'll see you cry!
Or I'll see YOU cry!
Jeez you TSM Fanboys really downvote a fella.

http://fantasy.lolesports.com/share/join/league/733316/oBl4ATCu3ek997MAkAFh

Sorry Vix, gave you the wrong one last time.
Its full. So :(

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=6GtYFVh3,comment-id=0000000000050000,timestamp=2015-05-21T13:13:21.649+0000)
>
> Its full. So :(

Sorry bro
No worries.
CALLED IT! TSM won.
Until they lose to C9.
Not if TSM sees THEM burn!
C9 will bring their extinguishers! And nuke TSM to the ground!
Good thing TSM is nuke proof and made of Greek Fire cause nothing C9 does will stop the powerhouse that is TSM!
The Super Secret Nukes that C9 has cannot be stopped. You shall see when TSM kneels before them.
What part of "nuke proof" do you not understand? TSM will crush C9 like a clam on an otter's belly and force C9 to kneel before TSM!
What part of Super Secret Nuke that bypasses all proofing do you not understand? C9 will convert the TSM Heathens or destroy them. There is no other option.
The only heathens here is C9 and TSM wil convert them to #Beylife4kife this Sunday!

Resistance is Futile my little TrollFan01! Prepare to watch the domination of the TSM nation. C9 will salt the earth with TSM's blood and tears. 

There is no afterlife for heathens such as them!

My poor silly little Vix, don't you know TSM will bath in the tears of C9 and continue to expand the Beylife nation across MSI? 

For the unwashed masses that are C9 they wI'll find NO afterlife for they did not live the bay life way!

Evil was allowed to live this day. True men had the ability to abolish this evil known as Baylife, and they ignored it.

Now, we must all fear evil men (TSM). But there is another kind of evil which we must fear most, and that is the indifference of good men(Laughing Fish/TrollFan01 and other Forum Warriors that believe the lies of Baylife).

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=6GtYFVh3,comment-id=00000000000300000005000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-17T15:59:20.933+0000)
>
> TSM will burn in Hellfire for their heresies and you shall follow them for preaching a false doctrine against the Almighty C9. 
> 
> Praise the Father (Charlie), the Son (Hai), and the Holy Jungler (Meteos).

You poor fool! The false prophets of C9 have corrupted your mind! Don't worry TSM will cure you of and take you to the promise land of Beylife.
Just listen to the true Father (Locodoco), The Son (Bjergsen), and the Holy Jungler (Santorin). You can tell they're the real deal because they have defeated their false counterparts in the NA LCS Playoffs Grand Final. ALL HAIL TEAM SOLOMID THE CHAMPIONS OF NA!

TSM will burn in Hellfire for their heresies and you shall follow them for preaching a false doctrine against the Almighty C9. 

Praise the Father (Charlie), the Son (Hai), and the Holy Jungler (Meteos).

You don't know Bjerg very well. He says he doesn't like Teemo. Not that he can't play him.

Those winds of chanel are nothing more than a gentle breeze that will simply go by TSM and do nothing more than amuse them.

Woosh
C9 will See them BURN!

BurgerKing is never demoralized. He'd just see Teemo and realize it's time for revenge and take it to a 1-0 lead for TSM. Just wait. 

Bjerg cold always pick Omega Squad Teemo too and use it to wreck Hai and C9 so baldy TSM wins 3-0.

You don't know a lot about bjerg. He's admitted tons of times, he can't play teemo. O.o I sense a change. The winds of C9 coming to blow TSM off their pedestal.

Woosh.
That was then and this is now. Teemo won't work this time as TSM know how to counter it and Locodoco will be able to use it to TSM'S advantage.
I believe Teemo could demoralize Bjerg.  Bjergerking meets Satan in a clash for LCS Finals!
You do remember Bjerg totally dominanted Hai in that match up right? Just you wait till TSM stomps C9 then you can say whoever us at MSI will stomp TSM and I'll retort with something witty.
About my Teemo Prediction: [See Week 1 Day 1 TSM v C9](http://lol.gamepedia.com/Riot_League_Championship_Series/North_America/2014_Season/Picks_and_Bans/Spring_Season/Spring_Season/Week_1)
Nope! C9 is looking their weakest while TSM IA arguably looking their strongest. TSM will win again and we'll start this up again for MSI.
Just you wait, Hai First game Teemo (Omega Squadron) will scare Bjerg into series loss.

i am a huge tsm fan, i actually don't want tsm to win this. Maybe 2nd place but for sure not first.
I like the tsm fans the way they are. After tsm wins this no one would want another team to win. Plus TIP is a sick team. Still hope Dyrone pulls the {{champion:8}}!!!!!!!
http://fantasy.na.lolesports.com/en-US/league/733316 Hey Vixxy, join my fantasy league!
Terms of right now, probably. But it'd be boring if it came out like this so... I sure hope itll be different. I dont want TSM or C9 to win, makes it more fun to watch,
no C9 MUST DOMINATE 4EVER TSM MUST GET RELEGATED
Don't want it. I want that cupcake you use as a icon though... {{champion:31}}

Oh my poor little Vixanys. The evil men of C9 have brainwashed you good haven't they? This is a joyous day! Beylife is alive and thriving and you can't be happy cause your forever 4th team placed 3rd somehow. 

Don't worry, the inate goodness that is TSM and Beylife will cure you of our brainwashing and then you can be happy:D

>...our brainwashing and then you can be happy:D

YOU EVIL TSM FOLLOWER YOU!  You will never have my brain!

TSM
TSM
TSM
